text: Ezɨ enselɨn igharazim iza ofa gamir dakozim boroghɨn tughav iti. A golɨn mɨner mamɨn suira, mɨner kam, me an aven paura tuazɨ a isia mɨgharir mughuriar aghuim otifi. Ezɨ me pauran avɨrir maba a ganɨngi, eghtɨ a Godɨn gumazamizibar azangsɨzibar sara isafuragh, atrivir dabirabimɨn guamɨn mangɨva golɨn ofa gamir dakozimɨn God bagh ofa damuam.
